label: from reflection Discussion / Moral Dilemma and Guilt Revelation
quotes: No. An accident is not a crime.
So? Isn't it murder to slay a man?
No, not always. There is manslaughter, homicide, assault resulting in death, with the subdivisions, with or without intent.

label: Shift to Criminal Confession
quotes: Now I'll go to the sheriff and give myself up.

label: revelation Discussion
quotes: Ah, now things are beginning to clear up. How much do you ask to become accomplice to the homicide?
Now everything is clear to me! Ah!
MR. X: Now everything is clear to me! Ah!

label: revelation Discussion
quotes: You see? The first time I mentioned the sheriff in connection with the thunderbolt, you wanted to run then, too; and when a man has been in that prison he never wants to go to the windmill hill every day to look at it, or put himself behind a window-pane to--to conclude, you have served one sentence, but not another.
I see in the mirror that you are a thief, a simple, common thief.
Now everything is clear to me! Ah!

label: confrontation escalation Discussion
quotes: May I go now?
Yes, you may go now.
Are you angry with me?

label: revelation Discussion
quotes: That is my secret.
MR. Y: 'That is my secret.'
MR. X: 'May I look at you?--You think of writing an anonymous letter to my wife, disclosing my secret.'

label: escalation Discussion
quotes: Ah, you devil! You've struck my Achilles heel--will you force me to become a murderer?
You see, then, there is a difference in people after all, and you feel within you that I cannot commit such deeds as you, and that is your advantage.
You are a different kind of being from me--whether stronger or weaker I do not know--more criminal or not--that doesn't concern me. But you are the stupider, that's proven.

label: escalation Discussion / Confrontational Shift and Challenge
quotes: You were too cowardly, just as you were too cowardly to tell your wife that she is married to a murderer.
You are a different kind of being from me--whether stronger or weaker I do not know--more criminal or not--that doesn't concern me.
Then you don't believe that I ever took from the case?

label: Shift to Command
quotes: MR. Y: Can I go?
MR. X: Now you shall go--immediately. Your things will follow you.
